title: Calories in Ground Beef 80/20
meta_description: Learn calories in ground beef 8020 per 100g, including protein, fat breakdown, sodium, and cooking tweaks for better meal planning.
assumptions: 80% lean / 20% fat ground beef, cooked (pan-broiled crumbles), drained; no added salt, oil, or seasonings.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, exact fat content, cooking method, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 100 g cooked 80/20 ground beef provides ~246 kcal and ~25 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts labels for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Add 1 tsp olive oil for cooking per 100 g
Raw (uncooked) instead of cooked per 100 g

faqs.q: How many calories in 100g ground beef 80/20?
faqs.a: About 246 kcal for cooked, drained 80/20 ground beef.

faqs.q: What's the protein in ground beef 8020?
faqs.a: Roughly 25 g protein per 100 g cooked.

faqs.q: Does cooking method affect calories in ground beef 80/20?
faqs.a: Yesâ€”broiling or draining reduces fat/calories vs. frying without draining.

faqs.q: How much fat is in 80/20 ground beef?
faqs.a: About 16 g total fat per 100 g cooked, with 6 g saturated.
Yes, 0 g carbs and high protein/fat make it suitable, but watch portions for calories.
